extendedInfo.description: The Indiana Lawyer FREE FOR A LIMITED TIME ONLY! Award winning, legal news covering the state of Indiana. Accessible when you want it, wherever you go! Indiana Lawyer, the premier source for legal news in Indiana, offers this best-in-class application for use on your mobile device. Everything you need to know about legal news in Indiana: â¢	Latest/Breaking News â¢	Law Firms â¢	Opinions (Court of Appeals) â¢ Courts â¢	Pro bono/Legal aid â¢	Law schools â¢	Discipline â¢	Government â¢	Feature stories â¢	Bar Associations â¢ CLE Calendar â¢	In-house counsel profiles â¢	On the Move (legal people and positions) â¢	Photo Galleries â¦and much more! Sharing features include: â¢	Forward to a friend via email â¢	Send story link via text message â¢ Post content to Twitter/Facebook Also includes: â¢	Indiana Lawyer Events â¢	Weather forecast â¢	Top news from Indianapolis Business Journal too For complete business news coverage for Central Indiana be sure to download the Indianapolis Business Journal app!

reviews.title: Nice but like society leaves disabled people out.
reviews.comment: Nice layout, easy to use.   Disabled people don\'t seem to fit here or in society. Nice  Like this does. Otherwise it is annouing trying to use.   Most of all it does not offer anything for disabled peoole. I see being homeless like I was for 8 months Indianapolis I could jave found legal help with my issue. But, being disabled and male leaveing a marriage that I can not afford divorcing three years late. Needed not be disabled just  and needed this 600 dollar phone, to learn I could had gotten probono help.
reviews.author: Jon Abilitv

reviews.title: Informative
reviews.comment: The app works great, I\'ve used examples for my legal writing/research class and criminal psychology class. However  after reading some of these cases, maybe they should work on the government in Indiana, because it needs it!
reviews.author: A Google User
